What is (are) Charcot-Marie-Tooth disease ?,"Charcot-Marie-Tooth disease is a group of disorders that affect the peripheral nerves, the nerves running from outside the brain and spine. Defects in many different genes cause different forms of this disease. Common symptoms may include foot drop, foot deformity, loss of lower leg muscle, numbness in the foot or leg, slapping"" gait (feet hit the floor hard when walking), and weakness of the
